update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

sensors_path.title: Sensors path
sensors_path.description: Path with the sensor directories that contain the w1_slave files.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout for executing the binary, specified in seconds.

sensors_path.ui:help: Default is `/sys/bus/w1/devices`. You can change this in case you want to monitor virtual sensors that log their files in another directory.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
